name: Kibana
description: Build analytics and data visualization dashboards for Elasticsearch with Kibana 4.

ELASTICSEARCH_URL.description: URL to the Elasticsearch cluster you want to use with Kibana

ELASTICSEARCH_TLS_CA_URL.description: If Elasticsearch is using HTTPS with self-signed certificate, URL to this one

ES_SSL_VERIFICATION_MODE.description: If you're using a custom hostname not handled by the TLS certificate, set to 'none'

BUILDPACK_URL.description: Buildpack to use to deploy kibana
